scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains the unrevised galley proof, 1938, of Action at Aquila,and a page proof, 1929, of Sarah Simoncontaining the "Dartmore" error, inscribed by Allen to James F. Drake, Sr., and from Marston E. Drake to Clifton Waller Barrett.

On front cover, author's inscription "With the suggestion that this unique set of sheets with the 'Dartmore' error be presented with very best wishes to James F. Drake, Sr. of 14 West 40th St. New York City. Hervey Allen." Underneath, inscribed "For C. Waller Barrett from James F. Drake's son Marston E. Drake Oct. 16, 1959."
